resources.string:
KeySmith is your friendly, easy-to-use password generator—designed with care to help you create strong, secure, and unique passwords in just a few taps.

 In today\’s digital world, security is more important than ever. That\’s why KeySmith is here to make password creation simple, stress-free, and safe—without the technical headache.

 Whether you're setting up a new account or upgrading an old password, KeySmith gives you the flexibility to create passwords that fit your needs, fast and securely.

 ✨ Lots of premium features are on the way, and we're building them with you in mind!

 Got a suggestion or found a bug? Feel free to reach out to the developer—we\’d love to hear from you.
